relatedBlades.title: Get the Latest GartnerⓇ Market Guide for Email Security
relatedBlades.subtitle: Area 1 recognized as a Representative Vendor for Integrated Cloud Email Security (ICES) category
relatedBlades.copy:
![Gartner® Email Security](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/3cl0QVijOQaifBkZQiA4JH/17fb05f487d45714216a49c402afe830/gartner-email-security-image.png)

The 2021 GartnerⓇ Market Guide for Email Security offers guidance to ensure that your email security solution remains appropriate for the changing landscape - particularly in the face of increasing malware, Business Email Compromise, account takeover threats, and other sophisticated attacks.

Request your copy now to learn:
- How better email security can help __address ransomware, impersonation, and account takeover attacks__
- Why to __compare your current email security solution's capabilities__ against the native capabilities provided by Google and Microsoft - and the __benefits of Integrated Cloud Email Security (ICES) solutions__
- Why to "Look for email security solutions that use ML- and AI-based __anti-phishing technology for BEC protection__ to analyze conversation history to detect anomalies, as well as computer vision to analyze suspect links within emails"
